desc.en: This page lists all the tracks from Blue Archive's OST.
desc.jp: This page lists all the tracks from Blue Archive's OST.
desc.thai: This page lists all the tracks from Blue Archive's OST.
desc.ko: This page lists all the tracks from Blue Archive's OST.
desc.zh_cn: 本页列出所有的蔚蓝档案OST曲子。
desc.zh_tw: 本頁列出所有的蔚藍檔案OST曲子。

desc.en: The first track in Blue Archive OST, as well as the very song played when logging in.
desc.jp: The first track in Blue Archive OST, as well as the very song played when logging in.
desc.thai: The first track in Blue Archive OST, as well as the very song played when logging in.
desc.ko: The first track in Blue Archive OST, as well as the very song played when logging in.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第一首曲子，也是在登录界面会播放的曲子。
desc.zh_tw: The first track in Blue Archive OST, as well as the very song played when logging in.

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.jp: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.thai: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.ko: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。
desc.zh_tw: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.

desc.en: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.jp: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.thai: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.ko: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第七首曲子，以其与人物及故事相关的梗和二创而相当热门和出名。
desc.zh_tw: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.thai: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.ko: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。
desc.zh_tw: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.

desc.en: The 11th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays at the "Recruitment" (Gacha) page.
desc.jp: The 11th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays at the "Recruitment" (Gacha) page.
desc.thai: The 11th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays at the "Recruitment" (Gacha) page.
desc.ko: The 11th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays at the "Recruitment" (Gacha) page.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十一首曲子，常在“招聘”（抽卡）页面播放。
desc.zh_tw: The 11th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays at the "Recruitment" (Gacha) page.

desc.en: The 12th track in Blue Archive, used especially in the "Story" page and its subpages, as well as at the end of every story (To Be Continued).
desc.jp: The 12th track in Blue Archive, used especially in the "Story" page and its subpages, as well as at the end of every story (To Be Continued).
desc.thai: The 12th track in Blue Archive, used especially in the "Story" page and its subpages, as well as at the end of every story (To Be Continued).
desc.ko: The 12th track in Blue Archive, used especially in the "Story" page and its subpages, as well as at the end of every story (To Be Continued).
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十二首曲子，尤其用于“故事”页及其下属页面中，以及每个故事的结尾（即“To Be Continued”未完待续界面）。
desc.zh_tw: The 12th track in Blue Archive, used especially in the "Story" page and its subpages, as well as at the end of every story (To Be Continued).

desc.en: The 14th track in Blue Archive, used especially in the "Home" page when no recollection lobby is presented.
desc.jp: The 14th track in Blue Archive, used especially in the "Home" page when no recollection lobby is presented.
desc.thai: The 14th track in Blue Archive, used especially in the "Home" page when no recollection lobby is presented.
desc.ko: The 14th track in Blue Archive, used especially in the "Home" page when no recollection lobby is presented.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十四首曲子，尤其用于非回忆大厅的主界面中。
desc.zh_tw: The 14th track in Blue Archive, used especially in the "Home" page when no recollection lobby is presented.

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.thai:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.ko:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。
desc.zh_tw:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.

desc.en: The 23th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player acquired victory over a battle.
desc.jp: The 23th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player acquired victory over a battle.
desc.thai: The 23th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player acquired victory over a battle.
desc.ko: The 23th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player acquired victory over a battle.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第二十三首曲子，尤其用于玩家取得一场战斗的胜利后。
desc.zh_tw: The 23th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player acquired victory over a battle.

desc.en: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.
desc.jp: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.
desc.thai: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.
desc.ko: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第二十七首曲子，尤其用于玩家输掉一场战斗后。
desc.zh_tw: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.

desc.en: The 32th track in Blue Archive, used especially when a situation gets better (often with Sensei's assistance).
desc.jp: The 32th track in Blue Archive, used especially when a situation gets better (often with Sensei's assistance).
desc.thai: The 32th track in Blue Archive, used especially when a situation gets better (often with Sensei's assistance).
desc.ko: The 32th track in Blue Archive, used especially when a situation gets better (often with Sensei's assistance).
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第三十二首曲子，尤其用于形势转好时（通常有老师参与协助的部分）。
desc.zh_tw: The 32th track in Blue Archive, used especially when a situation gets better (often with Sensei's assistance).

desc.en: The 45th track in Blue Archive, a theme song for Abydos High School. It is often used with members from Abydos High School with situation improving. A notable usage is the strategy planning for rescuing Hoshino.
desc.jp: The 45th track in Blue Archive, a theme song for Abydos High School. It is often used with members from Abydos High School with situation improving. A notable usage is the strategy planning for rescuing Hoshino.
desc.thai: The 45th track in Blue Archive, a theme song for Abydos High School. It is often used with members from Abydos High School with situation improving. A notable usage is the strategy planning for rescuing Hoshino.
desc.ko: The 45th track in Blue Archive, a theme song for Abydos High School. It is often used with members from Abydos High School with situation improving. A notable usage is the strategy planning for rescuing Hoshino.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第三十二首曲子，阿拜多斯高中的主题曲。常用于阿拜多斯高中成员出现且情况转好时。一个比较著名的使用例是大家在计划救出星野的时候。
desc.zh_tw: The 45th track in Blue Archive, a theme song for Abydos High School. It is often used with members from Abydos High School with situation improving. A notable usage is the strategy planning for rescuing Hoshino.

realname.zh_cn: 机械迷林(High-Tech Full On Mix)
机械迷林(High-Tech Full On Mix)

desc.en: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.
desc.jp: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.
desc.thai: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.
desc.ko: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第五十五首曲子，在第三篇故事中尤为明显。其经常与梓联系起来，后者当时与阿里乌斯(奧利斯)小队作战时因自己“杀了人”而自责。
desc.zh_tw: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.

desc.en: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.jp: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.thai: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.ko: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第64首曲子，于“游戏开发部”相关章节中广泛使用。其已经成为游戏开发部及其成员实质上的标志性曲目。
desc.zh_tw: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.

desc.en: The 101th track in Blue Archive OST, used especially during the battle of the event "The Ark of Atrahasis Conquest."
desc.jp: The 101th track in Blue Archive OST, used especially during the battle of the event "The Ark of Atrahasis Conquest."
desc.thai: The 101th track in Blue Archive OST, used especially during the battle of the event "The Ark of Atrahasis Conquest."
desc.ko: The 101th track in Blue Archive OST, used especially during the battle of the event "The Ark of Atrahasis Conquest."
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第101首曲子，在最终篇第三章占领方舟的活动战斗任务里使用。
desc.zh_tw: The 101th track in Blue Archive OST, used especially during the battle of the event "The Ark of Atrahasis Conquest."

desc.en: The 118th track in Blue Archive OST, used especially in Chapter 4, Volume 3. It is usually the combat song for Arius Squad.
desc.jp: The 118th track in Blue Archive OST, used especially in Chapter 4, Volume 3. It is usually the combat song for Arius Squad.
desc.thai: The 118th track in Blue Archive OST, used especially in Chapter 4, Volume 3. It is usually the combat song for Arius Squad.
desc.ko: The 118th track in Blue Archive OST, used especially in Chapter 4, Volume 3. It is usually the combat song for Arius Squad.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第113首曲子，尤其用于第三篇第四章。其一般是阿里乌斯(奥利斯)小队的作战曲。
desc.zh_tw: The 118th track in Blue Archive OST, used especially in Chapter 4, Volume 3. It is usually the combat song for Arius Squad.

desc.en: The 140th track in Blue Archive, known for segments related to the character Aris in the main story.
desc.jp: The 140th track in Blue Archive, known for segments related to the character Aris in the main story.
desc.thai: The 140th track in Blue Archive, known for segments related to the character Aris in the main story.
desc.ko: The 140th track in Blue Archive, known for segments related to the character Aris in the main story.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第140首曲子，以主线故事中与爱丽丝的相关部分而熟知。
desc.zh_tw: The 140th track in Blue Archive, known for segments related to the character Aris in the main story.
